name: 9LiVEs (GameB0i)
description:
GDevelop Game Jam Entry

Witness the story of of a dad scientist on his journey through the.... oh wait I shouldn't be saying that just yet mehehe... Something, do you fix something? Or do you build something? Do you fight something? Or do you run towards, or away from something? Will it matter which one is which? Will it change a thing if you don't flip a switch? Man I'm running out of lines. I don't even know what I'm saying anymore.🤧🤣 Just play the game okay?

Tho the browser version works okay,  the game and  music tends to lag or become unresponsive sometimes (try to restart the game for it to work) so I recommend downloading the game for better experience and wear headphones and turn the volume up. Or don't. I mean I can't really tell you what to do haha.  Enjoy!😁
